QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Describes an element's knowledge regarding accessing other (i.e., remote) Servers and Systems.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The EnabledLogicalElement which has knowledge of the remote server or system.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: Indicates that this access information is defined as a default configuration for the system.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: When an element is accessing remote services and systems, it MAY be necessary to order those accesses. This property defines that ordering - where lower numbers indicate a higher priority for access. A value of 0 (default) indicates that ordering does not apply. If multiple RemoteAccessPoint instances have the same value for OrderOfAccess, then these AccessPoints MAY be used in any sequence defined by the implementation.
